person.content:

Paragraph: The web site ( http://www.pt.lu/infoweb/kreschtmaart ) gives details of the market 's concert programme as well as its various retailers .

| Person |
| --- |
| the web site (author or publisher of the information) |

In this paragraph, there is no explicit mention of any specific person. The paragraph is mainly about a website and its content related to a market's concert program and retailers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| the web site (publisher of the information) |

In this paragraph, the only entity that clearly refers to a person is "the web site" which is identified as the publisher of the information. The market, concert program, and retailers are not persons.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The web site ( http://www.pt.lu/infoweb/kreschtmaart ) gives details of the market 's concert programme as well as its various retailers .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| PT (assuming it is the name of the organization that owns or manages the website) |
| infoweb (assuming it is a department or division of PT)
| kreschtmaart (assuming it is the name of the market) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| PT |
| infoweb |
| kreschtmaart |

Explanation:

* PT: The paragraph mentions "The web site (<http://www.pt.lu/infoweb/kreschtmaart>)". PT is the organization that owns or manages the website based on the given URL.
* infoweb: The paragraph mentions "gives details of the market 's concert programme as well as its various retailers" and "The web site (<http://www.pt.lu/infoweb/kreschtmaart>)". infoweb is likely a department or division of PT that manages the specific webpage for the market's concert program and retailers.
* kreschtmaart: The paragraph mentions "The web site (<http://www.pt.lu/infoweb/kreschtmaart>) gives details of the market 's concert programme". kreschtmaart is the name of the market.
